i still without finding the binary in the game, i selected borderlands 2>contents>gamedata>binaries but theres no binary to replace, only a folder called Win32. Please help (i installed the native version of borderlands 2 for mac)

Right click Borderlands 2 > Show package contents >Contents > MacOS. 

Then open terminal and type chmod +x (With a space after the X.) 

Drag the borderlands 2 file from the torret folder to terminal and press enter. 

Then Drag the converted file to the original Borderlands 2 Binary. Hope this helps!
